item.title: How do you add ::pickup command to TestScape?
item.dc:creator: @xRYUx xRYUx
item.description:
@xRYUx wrote:

So player 0 is normal, 1 is mod, and 2 is admin?

I can’t make myself admin on testscape. Whenever I edit the character file, then log in and out, the character file is back to normal, I also can’t edit my items and stats. Whats the problem?

Edit: I made a character with no spaces in there name an admin but I have no idea how. What do you do if it has spaces?

Edit: I got it working

Read full topic

item.title: How do you add ::pickup command to TestScape?
item.dc:creator: @_1killa #1killa
item.description:
@_1killa wrote:

pick up is already in testscape [br][size=1]Posted at: September 03, 2006, 11:43:40 PM[/size][hr]else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 2) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10"); }

see[br][size=1]Posted at: September 03, 2006, 11:44:20 PM[/size][hr]change the 2 to 0 to make it use able to every 1

Read full topic
item.source: How do you add ::pickup command to TestScape?

item.title: How do you add ::pickup command to TestScape?
item.dc:creator: @xRYUx xRYUx
item.description:
@xRYUx wrote:

} else if (command.startsWith("pickup")) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10"); }

Now what do I put it after in client.java?

Thanks
-Ryu

Read full topic
